document.full_text: volkswagen  made a long-awaited bid for man , valuing it at $20 billion and stepping up plans to merge the german truckmaker with swedish rival scania  in which it also holds a stake.
document.title: vw makes $20 billion man offer to kick off truck merger
lines_and_colors: volkswagen  made a long-awaited bid for man , valuing it at $20 billion and stepping up plans to merge the german truckmaker with swedish rival scania  in which it also holds a stake.
